content: *skill level * easy --- > sweeten up your kitchen decor with > this pretty cherry pie hot pad --- *yarn requirements * lily® sugar n cream® solids 2 5 oz/70 9 g * contrast a #00082 jute *1 ball* * contrast b #01530 country red *1 ball* --- video tutorial 1 1 https //www yarnspirations com/video-y-crochet-cherry-pie-hot-pad html
